data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 843 believers in Ash Sharqiyah North.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ash Sharqiyah North, Oman
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 843 believers in Ash Sharqiyah North to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 128,158 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Ash Sharqiyah North prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 129,000 citizens of the the state of Ash Sharqiyah North.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Ash Sharqiyah North to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Ash Sharqiyah North, Oman.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 843 believers in the state of Ash Sharqiyah North the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

location.name: Ash Sharqiyah North
location.people_groups_list: Punjabi, Mahra, Shahari, Jibbali, Baloch, Southern, Arab, Yemeni
